akn:section.akn:heading: Establishment of the First Responder Network Authority

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Establishment There is established as an independent authority within the NTIA the “First Responder Network Authority” or “FirstNet”.
(f) Quorum Eight members of the Board shall constitute a quorum, including at least 6 of the members appointed under subsection (b)(1)(D).
